confirmed_facts: President Lee announced the SHINE initiative during his visit to Cairo on 20 November 2025.
The initiative focuses on Stability, Harmony, Innovation, Network, and Education.
Lee pledged a contribution of 10 million USD to Egypt's Gaza reconstruction program.
Lee highlighted Korea's involvement in Lebanon since 2007 and support for a twoâ€‘state solution.
Lee emphasized plans to sign a Comprehensive Economic Partnership Agreement (CEPA) with Egypt.

timeline.event: President Lee delivered a speech at Cairo University announcing the SHINE initiative and pledged 10 million USD for Gaza reconstruction.
